q3map_feedback.message: xmap v1.0s (c) 1999-2005 Id Software, Inc. and XreaL contributors

************ ERROR ************ usage: xmap [-<switch> [-<switch> ...]] <mapname>
Switches: bspinfo = print BSP information bsp2ase = convert BSP to the 3D Studio Max ASCII format map2map = convert from any map format to the XreaL map format t3d2map = convert an Unreal Engine 3.0 .t3d to the XreaL map format map2bsp = compile MAP to BSP vis = compute visibility light = compute lighting vlight = compute volume lighting
